TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter

summary.span: 提供將 物件來回轉換至其他型別物件的型別轉換器。

span.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別也包含方法來寫入至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)]封裝及讀取從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)]指定字串，表示封裝[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的。This class also has methods for writing a to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] package and reading a from an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package that is given a string that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the . 請參閱基底類別和重要的使用方式資訊。See the base classes and for important usage notes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別，以實作`destinationType`必須或擲回例外狀況。As implemented in this class, `destinationType` must be a or the exception is thrown. 字串的格式而異的值`context`和`culture`。The format of the string varies according to the value of `context` and `culture`. 如果`culture`是`null`，會使用目前的系統文化特性。If `culture` is `null`, the current system culture is used.
